tasks.label: Publish latest VSIX to VS Code Marketplace
args: $ErrorActionPreference = 'Stop'; $vsix = Get-ChildItem -Path '${workspaceFolder}' -Filter *.vsix -Recurse | Sort-Object LastWriteTime -Descending | Select-Object -First 1; if (-not $vsix) { Write-Error 'No .vsix file found. Run the "Package VSIX" task first.'; exit 1 }; if (-not $env:VSCE_PAT) { Write-Error 'Environment variable VSCE_PAT is not set. Create a Personal Access Token and set it before running this task.'; exit 1 }; Write-Host 'Publishing' $vsix.FullName; npx --yes vsce publish --packagePath "$($vsix.FullName)" --skip-duplicate | cat
